content: a super easy and fun crochet toy for babies and toddlers rainbow ball by lisa from plum queen design rainbow ball | plum queen design yarn requirements schachenmayr catania solids 100% cotton in 7-9 different colors approximately 20g per color sizes one-size gauge 26 sts x 36 rs = 10 cm x 10 cm = 4 in x 4 in material 3 0mm us 3 crochet hook darning needle fiberfill stuffing techniques magic_ring chain and single_crochet final measurements approximately 10cm x 12cm page 2 of 4 ice t | plum queen design abbreviations chain chain mc magic_ring r s row s single_crochet single_crochet st s stitch es tipps before you start customize you can make the ball as big as you like just continue in the same fashion as indicated in the pattern you may require more yarn don t use a bigger hook the fabric will have holes and the fiberfill will peek through which is not suitable for the use by small children weave in your ends tightly children tend to not be too careful with their toys contact thank you for choosing my pattern enjoy crocheting you have any questions about this pattern plumqueendesign@gmail com you like this pattern and want to see more @plum queen design copyright
